title: Number of committed crimes , by type U.S. 2018
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Type of crime, and Number of committed crimes in each Type of crime on the y axis.
The Number of committed crimes is appeared to be the highest at Type of crime Property crime  (total) and lowest at Type of crime Murder and nonnegligent manslaughter.
There is a difference of 7179831.0 between the maximum Type of crime Property crime  (total) and minimum Type of crime Murder and nonnegligent manslaughter.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Type of crime in the x axis and Number of committed crimes in the y axis.
The maximum Number of committed crimes 7196045.0 is found at Type of crime Property crime  (total) and the minimum is found at Murder and nonnegligent manslaughter where Type of crime is 16214.0.
Type of crime Larceny-theft has the second highest value for Number of committed crimes.
There is a difference of 7179831.0 between the maximum Type of crime Property crime  (total) and minimum Type of crime Murder and nonnegligent manslaughter.

The Type of crime Property crime  (total) has the highest Number of committed crimes, followed by Larceny-theft, and Burglary. Down to the Type of crime Murder and nonnegligent manslaughter which is the lowest.
The lowest value 16214.0 at Murder and nonnegligent manslaughter is almost 3.84 times smaller than the average value 1871554.56.
Summing up the values of all Type of crimes, we get total 16843991.0.
